set.name: DM23-BD2 Game Designers Selection Deck: Fire Darkness Jyaoumon

property.name: Race
property.value: Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ONIEND}: Whenever a creature attacks, if there is a player that has no shields and you have at least one darkness card and one fire card in your mana zone, you may cast this spell from your hand for no cost. ■ Put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. From among the cards put into your graveyard in this way, choose a darkness or fire non-evolution creature that costs 6 or less and put it. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. Those 2 creatures battle.

property.value: King Master Card

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD2 Game Designers Selection Deck: Fire Darkness Jyaoumon

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Sonic Command/S-Rank Invader

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on a darkness or fire creature. ■ S-Rank Invasion "Lightning Sonic": Darkness or Fire Command (When one of your darkness or fire commands attacks, you may put this creature from your hand, your graveyard, or the battle zone on top of it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, your opponent puts a seal on all their creatures that have the lowest power. (To seal a card, put the top of your deck face down on it. Sealed creatures are ignored.)

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD2 Game Designers Selection Deck: Fire Darkness Jyaoumon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Instead of paying this creature’s cost, you may shuffle 8 darkness and/or fire cards from your graveyard and put them on the bottom of your deck to summon this creature. ■ Each of your creatures get "speed attacker". {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. From among them, you may put a Demonio.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD2 Game Designers Selection Deck: Fire Darkness Jyaoumon

property.name: Race
property.value: Demonio/Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you would lose the game, if it's your opponent's turn, and you have have one or more darkness cards and one or more fire cards in your mana zone, you may reveal this card from your hand and put it on the bottom of your deck instead. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} 50px Oniend: When you put this creature, if there is a player that has no shields, put the bottom card of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a creature that costs 5 or less, you may put it.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD2 Game Designers Selection Deck: Fire Darkness Jyaoumon

property.name: Race
property.value: Demonio/Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, if you have at least one darkness card and one fire card in your mana zone and you have no 'Jaouga, Oniga Rakshasa' in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD2 Game Designers Selection Deck: Fire Darkness Jyaoumon

property.name: Race
property.value: Abyss Royale

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ABYSS RUSH} You may summon this creature from your graveyard. If you do, this creature can attack players this turn and is put on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn. {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, return up to 2 darkness cards from your graveyard to your hand. ■ 'Civil Count 5': Whenever this creature attacks, if you have a total of 5 or more darkness creatures and/or darkness tamaseeds, your opponent discards their hand.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM23-BD2 Game Designers Selection Deck: Fire Darkness Jyaoumon

property.name: Race
property.value: Demonio/Onifuda Kingdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, add one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger". Then choose one of your opponent's untapped creatures and destroy it. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature gets +4000 power and has "double breaker".

property.value: 50px Oniend: Whenever a creature attacks, if there is a player that has no shields and you have at least one darkness card and one fire card in your mana zone, you may summon this creature from your hand for no cost. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

You can't use the "shield trigger" abilities. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, this creature gets "power attacker +7000" and "triple breaker".

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Fire Bird

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, choose any number of cards in a player's graveyard. It's owner puts the chosen cards on the bottom of their deck in any order. Then you may choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs the same as or less than the number of chosen cards and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if this creature is in your hand, and that attack is the second attack by a creature this turn, after the attack, unless you put a 'Valchuris, Dragon Armored' this turn, you may put this creature. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.)
